testcase.name: Verify all the Home Page buttons are visible
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the HomePage after login......................................passed Then Check the buttons Home are present.....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify all the Home Page buttons are visible 2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the HomePage after login......................................passed Then Check the buttons Orders are present...................................passed

testcase.name: Verify all the Home Page buttons are visible 3
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the HomePage after login......................................passed Then Check the buttons Cart are present.....................................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on login page of the of application..............................passed When I enter valid email "testuser123@example.com" and password "Password@123" and click on login button.passed Then I should be able to view the home button in home page..................passed

testcase.name: Login using invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on login page of the of application..............................passed When I enter email "testuser123@example.com" and wrong password "random123" and click on login button.passed Then I should not be able to login and a error message should be displayed stating "Incorrect email or password.".passed

testcase.name: Login using email with invalid format
testcase.system-out: Given I am on login page of the of application..............................passed When I enter invalid email format "testuser.com" and a password "random123" and click on login button.passed Then I should get a error message below the email input field stating "*Enter Valid Email".passed
